item.title: CULP INC 10-K
item.description: CULP INC, which is in the Broadwoven Fabric Mills, Cotton [2211] industry, SEC 10-K filing on July 15, 2022 had 36310 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: fiscal - 498 instances income - 409 instances 2022 - 408 instances may - 375 instances 1 - 353 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
